Name: wifi
Description: Package wifi provides access to IEEE 802.11 WiFi device actions and statistics.  MIT Licensed.

Name: ethtool
Description: Package ethtool allows control of the Linux ethtool generic netlink interface. MIT Licensed.

Name: corerad
Description: CoreRAD is an extensible and observable IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Protocol router advertisement daemon. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: apcupsd_exporter
Description: Prometheus exporter that exposes metrics from apcupsd's NIS. MIT Licensed.

Name: vsock
Description: Package vsock provides access to Linux VM sockets (AF_VSOCK) for communication between a hypervisor and its virtual machines.  MIT Licensed.

Name: netlink
Description: Package netlink provides low-level access to Linux netlink sockets (AF_NETLINK). MIT Licensed.

Name: socket
Description: Package socket provides a low-level network connection type which integrates with Go's runtime network poller to provide asynchronous I/O and deadline support. MIT Licensed.

Name: ndp
Description: Package ndp implements the Neighbor Discovery Protocol, as described in RFC 4861.  MIT Licensed.

Name: consrv
Description: Command consrv is a SSH to serial console bridge server, originally designed for deployment on gokrazy.org devices. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: genetlink
Description: Package genetlink implements generic netlink interactions and data types. MIT Licensed.

Name: homelab
Description: Configuration management for Matt Layher's machines. MIT Licensed.

Name: wifiqr
Description: Package wifiqr implements support for generating WiFi QR codes. MIT Licensed.

Name: rvexec
Description: WIP riscv64 and Rust experiments. MIT Licensed.

Name: modemmanager_exporter
Description: Command modemmanager_exporter implements a Prometheus exporter for ModemManager and its devices. MIT Licensed.

Name: kobject
Description: Package kobject provides access to Linux kobject userspace events. MIT Licensed.

Name: talks
Description: Talks by Matt Layher.  MIT Licensed.

Name: ordered
Description: Package ordered implements data structures which maintain consistent ordering of inserted elements.

Name: taskstats
Description: Package taskstats provides access to Linux's taskstats interface, for sending per-task and per-process statistics from the kernel to userspace.  MIT Licensed.

Name: icmpx
Description: Package icmpx provides low-level ICMPv4 (IPPROTO_ICMP) and ICMPv6 (IPPROTO_ICMPV6) raw socket support for Linux. MIT Licensed.

Name: networkd
Description: Package networkd enables control of systemd-networkd using D-Bus. MIT Licensed.
